sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些连词均可表示"虽然，尽管"之意。
means: though和although在意义上几乎毫无区别，但文体上后者是较正式用词，语气比though强。此外，在习惯用法上这两个词仍有以下一些差异：1.though可引出倒装语序的让步状语从句，although 则不能。2.though可与even连用，although则不能；在as though结构中，只用though，不能用although。3.though可以置于从句末，而although则不能。4.引出省略句时，通常用though。
as ： 引出让步状语从句只用于倒装语序结构中，语气强于上述两个连词。

sentence.Network_en: Though his background was modest, it was in no sense deprived.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管他家境一般，但也并不算贫穷。

sentence.Network_en: The company treated me as though I were skiving.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司对待我的态度就好像是我上班时溜号了似的。

sentence.Network_en: His most prized time, though, will be spent quietly on his farm.
sentence.Network_cn: 不过，他最宝贵的时光将在自己的农场里平静地度过。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 常用的关连词有：though（虽然）, although（虽然），as（尽管，虽然）, even if （即使）, even thoug.

...我们可以看出，学习让步状语从句的关键是关联词的选用；其次，要注意的是由as引导的让步状语从句要用倒装语序。让步状语从句表示：虽然，尽管，即使等概念，由although,though(尽管，即使)，however(无论怎样)，whatever(无论什么)，whoever(无论谁)，whomever(无论谁)，whichever(无论哪个)，whenever(无论何时)，wherever(无论哪里)，wh.
仁爱英语八年级下册单词_百度文库 ... anybody 任何人；无论谁 though 虽然，可是 even though 即使，尽管.
I probably loosened it up 4 uthough不过,弄松Oogway was a crazy old turtle after all

list.abs: 纵是的意思_百度知道 ... 25. 纵声[ loudly;in a loud voice] 26. 纵使[ even if;even though] 27. 纵谈[ talk freely].
英语选词填空_爱问知识人 ... (None 没有一个) (Even though 即便) (as 作为).
as if 和as though区别 ... as oppesed to 与…不同；与…相反 as though 好像，好似 as to 关于；至于.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... as long as 只要 as though 好像，仿佛 as usual 通常，平常地.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English thēah, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch and German doch; superseded in Middle English by forms from Old Norse thó, thau

entry.def: You use though to introduce a statement in a subordinate clause which contrasts with the statement in the main clause. You often use though to introduce a fact which you regard as less important than the fact in the main clause.

example.ex: Gaelic has been a dying language for many years, though children are nowadays taught it in school...
example.tran: 盖尔语多年来一直濒于消亡，尽管如今孩子们还在学校学习这门语言。

example.ex: After news of this new court case Ford broke down again, though he blamed the breakdown on his work...
example.tran: 福特听到这一场新官司的消息后再次精神崩溃，尽管他说自己是因为工作才这样的。

entry.def: You use though to introduce a subordinate clause which gives some information that is relevant to the main clause and weakens the force of what it is saying.

example.ex: I look back on it as the bloodiest (though not literally) winter of the war...
example.tran: 我现在回想起来，觉得那是战时最血腥的(但并非字面意义上的)一个冬天。

example.ex: The problem was finally, though not conclusively, identified as a severely pinched nerve...
example.tran: 问题终于被认定为是神经受到严重挤压，尽管这还不是最终结论。

entry.def: You use though to indicate that the information in a clause contrasts with or modifies information given in a previous sentence or sentences.

example.ex: I like him. Though he makes me angry sometimes...
example.tran: 我喜欢他，不过他有时惹我生气。

example.ex: I want to try my hand at politics, or go back to the law. I don't want to go to school for it, though...
example.tran: 我想进入政坛，或者重操律师旧业。不过我不想进学校去专门学习。

entry.def: You can say though I say so myself or even though I say it myself when you are praising yourself or something you have done, but do not want to sound too proud.

example.ex: I'm a good cook, though I say it myself...
example.tran: 我并非自夸，我的厨艺的确高超。

example.ex: Even though I do say it myself we've probably got the best little restaurant in town.
example.tran: 不是我吹牛，我们的小饭店可能是全城最好的。

sentences.sentence: "even though she knew the answer, she did not respond"

auth_sentence.content: There is one problem with this approach, though.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is one problem with this approach, though.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is one problem with this approach, though.

auth_sentence.content: I am short though, so that probably helped.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am short though, so that probably helped.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am short though, so that probably helped.

auth_sentence.content: Such indifference, though, is about to change.
auth_sentence.res_content: Such indifference, though, is about to change.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Such indifference, though, is about to change.

Sentence.sentence: Under these circumstances, it's natural to look for what may appear to be the most "practical" way out of the problem "Major in a subject designed to get you a job" seems the obvious answer to some, though this ignores the fact that many disciplines in the humanities characterized as "soft" often, in fact, lead to employment and success in the long run.
Energy independence" and its rhetorical (修辞的) companion "energy security" are, however, slippery concepts that are rarely though through
She's afraid she won't be able to attend your class this afternoon though.
Though the United States has fewer women in the workforce(68percent compared to Sweden's 77 percent).
Though the Swedish model appears workable for most American parents, it may not be accepted by them in its entirety
Though the decline started in the 1970s, it became much steeper beginning in 2000.

means.word_mean: 虽然; 尽管; 即使

sentences.en: Though he's fool, I like him nonetheless.
sentences.cn: 虽然他很笨, 我仍然喜欢他。

sentences.en: It's quite pleasant today, though the wind is rather cool.
sentences.cn: 尽管风有点凉, 今天天气还是很不错的。

means.word_mean: （用于主句后，引出补充说明，使语气变弱）不过，可是，然而

sentences.en: They're very different, though they did seem to get on well when they met.
sentences.cn: 他们大不相同, 可是见面后好像还确实相处得不错.

sentences.en: He'll probably say no, though it's worth asking.
sentences.cn: 他很可能会拒绝, 不过问一下有益无害.

sentences.en: Though he may fail,he will try.
sentences.cn: 纵然他可能失败，他还是要试试。

means.word_mean: （尤用于句末补充说明，使语气减弱）不过，可是，然而

sentences.en: Our team lost. It was a good game though.
sentences.cn: 我们队输了,可是也不失为一场很好的比赛.

jushi.english: Exhausted though he was, he was not ashamed to learn.
jushi.chinese: 他虽然年纪大了,但不耻于学习。

jushi.english: Lover of towns though is Paul, he realizes that he owes a debt to his early country life.
jushi.chinese: 保尔虽然热爱城镇,但仍承认早年的乡村生活使他受益匪浅。

jushi.english: Though tall, he is very weak in health.
jushi.chinese: 他虽然长得高,但身体却很弱。
